page.title: 05Jobs in the district.
page.content: A lot of the men work in the china clay industry at the various pits between Indian Queens and St.Austell.The firm that employs them is called E.C.L.P.and china clay is sent all over the world. Towards the coast and away from the clay pits some men work on farms,as the land is mostly farm land. Many people,especially women, travel to Truro,St.Austell or Newquay to work in shops or offices.In the summer there are a lot of people who work in hotels or restaurants because of the large number of holidaymakers who visit places like Newquay.Some people have tourists stay overnight at their house for bed and breakfast. A few people work locally or have their own business. Some of the young people are unemployed,some don't seem to mind.
